sqlMap.select: SELECT user_id as userID, user_username as userName, user_password as password, user_email as email, user_cv_storage_link as cvStorageLink, user_facebook_token as facebookToken, user_google_token as googleToken, user_fullname as fullname, user_avata as avata, user_account_type as accountType, user_coverletter as coverLetter FROM users_tbl WHERE user_username = #userName# and user_password = #password#
